channel.title: Prog on Guy James
channel.description: Recent content in Prog on Guy James

item.title: Music of the Sun: The Eternal Fascination of Yes!
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: Prog rock. Progressive Rock. Filthy, hated, heretical noise, utterly shunned since Year Zero (1976). But I love it… or a great deal of it anyway. Those who lump dazzling avatars of God’s Own Progression like Yes, Genesis (the early version, naturally) and King Crimson in with lumpen regurgitators of egoistic bombast like Emerson Lake and Palmer are merely demonstrating their own cloth-ears. Where ELP sound totally of their time, Yes in particular are still in the fantastic future world they created for themselves.
